data.text: Davide ná-guyei.
Nà-nuɓusɛlai pɛ ge Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI maamusɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ tɔ ɠa é nà-faaɠaaza golaiti kpein suvaayɛsu,
é kìzoga kabayeɠei ma,
toɠa nà-eteai laave ga undaanɛɛiti kpein,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa ɗa faaɠaaza faiti sala,
É ná-peleiti dɛɛni ga Moize,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ɠa é zaalai veezu, é ɠɛ ga maawɔinɠaa ƓALAGI,
É la ɗa ga zelii loga yeenɔpɛ,
É la de zosu ga da-ɠotoiti kɛʋele,
Ʋele geeɠɔlɔgi maaɠooza la zooi ʋa, é zɛlɛni maazu,
Ʋelei folo ɠulazu maaɠoozaai la folo liizuʋɛ ʋa,
Ʋelei doun kɛɛɠɛi ná-dointi nɛai la bɛ,
Mazɔlɔɔ é kwɛɛ, nii de ɓɛtɛai la,
Nui! Ná-eteai ʋokɔɠɔgɛ tufai ma,
Siɛgi zu fiilɛi ʋuuzu la ma, é ɲɛɛlɛa,
Kɛlɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-wooɠɛɠiladai la valiboga ɠɔoɠɔ, naati bɛ, niiti ti luazu ba,
Toɠa ga naati tɔnɔ, niiti ti ziɛzu ga ná-minazeɠe gooiti,
Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ná-masa kpɔkpɔgi ɠa zeini geeɠɔlɔgi zu,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mama, wɔi wo ga ná-geezuɠeelaiti,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mama, wɔi wo ga geezu ɠɔɔɓɔgi,
À Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI mama, ná-kpɛtɛaniiti kpein,
